headline: Breakfast Grits
name: Breakfast Grits
description: Learn how to cook grits with this recipe. Fresh pepper and sharp Cheddar cheese liven up this dish. Simple and tasty, just the way grits should be.

recipeInstructions.text: Bring water and salt to a boil in a saucepan. Whisk in grits; continue to whisk for 1 minute. When the mixture comes to a boil again, turn the heat to low. Stir frequently, cook for 10 to 15 minutes.
Remove grits from the heat and add cheese, butter, and pepper; mix well. Stir until butter and cheese are melted.
